articles.author: Matthew Holt
articles.title: Early team news for Villa clash - Man Utd
articles.description: How both squads are shaping up for the Premier League bout at Old Trafford on Boxing Day.
articles.content: Raphael Varane fell ill ahead of our clash against David Moyes's side, and Erik ten Hag could provide an update on the centre-back in his pre-Villa press conference, which you will be able to see acr… [+539 chars]
